mapper.select: SELECT mac.factory ,mac.worksShop ,mac.productionLine ,mac.cncSystem FROM machineinfo mac with(nolock) WHERE mac.useStatus = 1 GROUP BY mac.factory ,mac.worksShop ,mac.productionLine ,mac.cncSystem

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by macPSH.macWorkTime DESC) rank ,mac.machineName ,(macPSH.macWorkTime/60)macWorkTime ,macPSH.macProdNum FROM machineinfo mac with(nolock) LEFT JOIN( SELECT macSH.machineCode , SUM(datediff(SECOND,macSH.startTime,macSH.endTime)) macWorkTime ,COUNT(1) macProdNum from machinestatushistory macSH with(nolock) WHERE macSH.status = 1 AND macSH.startTime IS NOT NULL AND macSH.endTime IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(varchar(100),macSH.startTime,23) BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY,-8, GETDATE()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY ,-1, GETDATE()), 23) GROUP BY macSH.machineCode ) macPSH ON mac.machineCode = macPSH.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macPSH.macWorkTime DESC

SELECT mac.machineName ,convert(varchar(100), macPArm.alarmMsg) alarmMsg ,macPArm.knifeNum ,macPArm.occurrenceTime FROM machineinfo mac with(nolock) INNER JOIN( select macArm.machineCode ,macArm.alarmMsg ,macArm.knifeNum ,MIN(macArm.occurrenceTime) occurrenceTime FROM machinealarmhistory macArm with(nolock) WHERE ASCII(macArm.alarmMsg) > 0 AND macArm.occurrenceTime BETWEEN DATEADD(MINUTE, -15, GETDATE()) AND GETDATE() GROUP BY macArm.machineCode ,macArm.alarmMsg ,macArm.knifeNum ) macPArm ON mac.machineCode = macPArm.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macPArm.occurrenceTime DESC

SELECT mac.machineName ,macKni.knifePosition ,macKni.totalCount ,macKni.currentCount FROM machineinfo mac with(nolock) INNER JOIN( SELECT kni.machineCode ,kni.knifePosition ,kni.totalCount ,kniL.currentCount FROM knifeinfo kni with(nolock) LEFT JOIN knifelife kniL with(nolock) ON kniL.machineCode = kni.machineCode AND kniL.knifeNum = kni.knifePosition WHERE kni.status = 1 ) macKni ON mac.machineCode = macKni.machineCode WHERE mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 ORDER BY macKni.machineCode ,macKni.knifePosition

select mac.productionLine ,broH.knifeDiameter ,COUNT(1) as brokenNum from brokenhistory broH with(nolock) join machineinfo mac with(nolock) on mac.machineCode = broH.machineCode where broH.bBroken=1 AND CONVERT(varchar(100),broH.brokenTime,23) BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY,-8, GETDATE()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY ,-1, GETDATE()), 23) AND mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 group by mac.productionLine,broH.knifeDiameter order by broH.knifeDiameter

select mac.productionLine ,broH.knifeNum ,COUNT(1) as brokenNum from brokenhistory broH with(nolock) join machineinfo mac with(nolock) on mac.machineCode = broH.machineCode where broH.bBroken=1 AND CONVERT(varchar(100),broH.brokenTime,23) BETWEEN CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY,-8, GETDATE()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100),DATEADD(DAY ,-1, GETDATE()), 23) AND mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 group by mac.productionLine,broH.knifeNum order by broH.knifeNum

SELECT COUNT(1) prodLineProdNum from machinestatushistory macSH with(nolock) LEFT JOIN machineinfo mac ON mac.machineCode = macSH.machineCode WHERE macSH.status = 1 AND macSH.startTime IS NOT NULL AND macSH.endTime IS NOT NULL AND CONVERT(varchar(100),macSH.startTime,23) = CONVERT(varchar(100),GETDATE(), 23) AND mac.factory = #{factory} AND mac.worksShop = #{worksShop} AND mac.productionLine = #{productionLine} AND mac.useStatus = 1 GROUP BY mac.productionLine
